DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "PLAINTIFFS ALLEGE THAT, IN ORDER TO SELL VARIOUS TYPES OF LIFE INSURANCE POLICIES, DEFENDANTS USED A FRAUDULENT SCHEME WHICH INCLUDED MISREPRESENTATIONS CONCERNING THE PREMIUM PAYMENTS TO BE PAID ON SUCH POLICIES, AS WELL AS OMISSIONS AND CONCEALMENT OF MATERIAL FACTS. DEFENDANTS’ ACTIONS ALLEGEDLY CONSTITUTED FRAUD, SUPPRESSION AND/OR CONCEALMENT, NEGLIGENT MISREPRESENTATION AND BREACH OF FIDUCUARY DUTY.  DAMAGES ARE UNSPECIFIED.",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "THIS LAWSUIT WAS RESOLVED AS PART OF THE SETTLEMENT OF A NUMBER OF LAWSUITS, CLAIMS, AND THREATENED CLAIMS BY PRESENT AND FORMER POLICYHOLDERS IN MISSISSIPPI AGAINST THE EMPLOYING FIRM AND/OR ITS AFFILIATES AND CERTAIN OF ITS CURRENT AND FORMER REPRESENTATIVES.  NO SPECIFIC PORTION OF THE TOTAL SETTLEMENT AMOUNT WAS ALLOCATED BY THE PAYING DEFNEDANTS TO RESOLVE SPECIFIC ALLEGED CLAIMS IN WHICH THE REGISTERED REPRESENTATIVE WAS A NAMED PARTY.  THE EMPLOYING FIRM BELIEVES THAT THE SETTLEMENT AMOUNT OF THIS LAWSUIT EXCEEDS $10,000.00.  THE EMPLOYING FIRM AND ITS REGISTERED REPRESENTATIVES EXPRESSLY DENY ANY WRONGDOING OR LIABILITY IN CONNECTION WITH THESE CLAIMS."
}

{
  "Allegations" : "REGARDING A VARIABLE UNIVERSAL LIFE INSURANCE POLICY PURCHASED IN OCTOBER 1998, THE CLIENT ALLEGES THE POLICY WAS MISREPRESENTED AND WAS UNAWARE OF ANY SURRENDER CHARGES",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$8,400.00",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "THE INVESTIGATION PROVED THE CLIENT SIGNED THE CONTRACT ACKNOWLEDGING HE RECEIVED A CURRENT PROSPECTUS, HE UNDERSTOOD THE CASH VALUE MAY FLUCTUATE, AND THE POLICY WAS IN LINE WITH THE CLIENT'S INSURANCE AND FINANCIAL NEEDS.  SOON AFTER, A POLICY DELIVERY RECEIPT WAS SIGNED AND THE CLIENT WAS GIVEN A FREE LOOK.  REGULAR POLICY STATEMENTS HAVE BEEN SENT TO THE CLIENT SINCE 1998.  COMPLAINT DENIED."
}
FINRA_EMPLOYMENT: MERRILL LYNCH PIERCE FENNER & SMITH INC. (7691)
